page.title: 20NEWS IN KEARSLEY
page.content: NEWS IN KEARSLEY On Monday 10 June and Tuesday 11 June 1985 The Bolton Evening News carried this news about our local area _ Kearsley. A local priest,Father Francis Austin of St. Gregory's Church celebrated 25 years of being a priest. A fridge and wardrobe worth Â£80 were stolen today when burglars broke into a house in Greenfold Avenue. Local committee members of the Royal National Lifeboat Institution wish to thank local people who helped raise Â£339 on the recent flag day. Mr. & Mrs. Brindle of Waverley Ave. had their car destroyed by fire while they were away on holiday in Malta. Arson is suspected. {THE MAIN HEADLINE was about a girl from Horwich,killed in a high speed collision between 2 speed boats on a lake in Cumbria.
